detaileddescription.para: MACRO for callback EVENT to join AP or create soft-AP successfully
MACRO for callback EVENT to fail to join AP
MACRO for callback EVENT to disconnect from AP or destroy soft-AP
MACRO for callbck EVENT to get IP address
MACRO for callback EVNET to create AP successfully
MACRO for callback EVNET to create soft-AP failed
MACRO for callback EVNET to close soft-AP
MACRO for callback EVNET to inform soft ap's net
These are the values for ip_addr_t.type

briefdescription.para: This function is used to initialize TCP/IP Stack.
This function is used to get IP parameters stored in tls_ethif struct.
This function is used to start DHCP Client.
This function is used to stop DHCP client.
This function is used to change IP address configuration.
This function is used to set dns servers.

parameterdescription.para: index of the DNS server to set must be < DNS_MAX_SERVERS
IP address of the DNS server to set

briefdescription.para: This function is used to bring up an interface,available for processing traffic.
This function is used to bring down an interface,disabling any traffic processing.
This function is used to add netif status changed callback to event list,if exists, do nothing.
This function is used to remove netif status changed callback from event list,if not exists, do nothing.
